key.name: recording-duration
key.description: Maximum recording duration in seconds (0:10 to 15:00)

key.name: post-recording-action
key.description: What to do with transcribed text after recording completes. Options: "preview" (show dialog), "type_only" (auto-type, X11 only), "copy_only" (copy to clipboard), "type_and_copy" (both, X11 only). On Wayland, auto-type options will show preview instead.

key.name: recording-ui-mode
key.description: How to display recording indicator: modal dialog (blocking) or panel indicator (non-blocking)

key.name: processing-ui-mode
key.description: How to display transcription processing: modal dialog (blocking), panel indicator (non-blocking), toast notification, or silent (errors only)
